actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to establish a maximum amount an air carrier may charge for changing the departure time or date or the arrival time or date for a prepaid airline ticket.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to establish a maximum fee (the lesser of $5 or ten percent of the amount of a prepaid airline ticket) an air carrier may charge for changing the departure time or date or the arrival time or date for such ticket.

titles.title: To amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to establish a maximum amount an air carrier may charge for changing the departure time or date or the arrival time or date for a prepaid airline ticket.
